description: Register a host with subscription and information. (resource: POST /api/hosts/subscriptions)
name: hosts.host_subscriptions_create

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

facts.description: Key-value hash of subscription-manager facts, nesting uses a perioddelimiter (.)

hypervisor_guest_uuids.description: UUIDs of the virtual guests from the host's hypervisor

installed_products.description:
"description: List of products installed on the host
 parameters:
     version:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Product version
     arch:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Product architecture
     product_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Product id as listed from a host's installed products,         this isnot the same product id as the products api returns
     product_name:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Product name as listed from a host's installed products
     "

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

release_version.description: Release version of the content host

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

service_level.description: A service level for auto-healing process, e.g. SELF-SUPPORT

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).

uuid.description: UUID to use for registered host, random uuid is generated if not provided
